Text:
what's the difference between WEBRIP n BRRip...?
quality wise...
i tried googling... not much luck...
(: so i decided to ask an expert ;)
Thanks. keep it up. nice movie.

Movies ripped from Blu Ray source is BRRip (Blu Ray Rip). Movies downloaded or viewed legally via from paid website(ie iTunes) are WEB-DL (Web Download) and when its riped again to ie 480p or 720p it called as WebRip (Web Download Rip). Well quality of Blu Ray are far better than Web-DL. But once ripped(ie BRRip or WebRip) the quality is always lower than the source.
Hard to say which will be better, at 480p and size I do, there wont be much diff in BRRip or WebRip.

Great quality A10/V10 for its size.
The film is fun, too. The kids loved it!
